title: Snow beautiful!
caption: Snow beautiful!
desc: Winter is here in full swing and while many of us prefer staying warm and cozy indoors, there are plenty of reasons to be outdoors, embracing the season in all its glory. In spite of the chilly temperatures, Torontonians boldly explore winter landscapes across the city, just like the park featured on the homepage today. From ice-skating and tobogganing to a simple stroll in nature, the city is filled with multiple avenues for people to stay active. If all this talk has inspired you to indulge in the outdoors today, be sure to check the temperature and don’t forget to bundle up!
copyright: Aerial view of a little park on a snowy day in Toronto (© Katrin Ray Shumakov/Getty Images)
